critique: The document describes an amendment to civil service rules, specifically Schedule A, Subdivision IX, Department of Agriculture, by adding a new clause (i). This clause pertains to temporary field workers (inspectors, scouts, etc.) employed in cooperation with states for enforcing the Plant Quarantine Act. These workers can only serve up to 180 days a year, and their employment details must be reported periodically. The document itself doesn't express strong opinions on ideological tilt, immigration, executive power, federalism, security vs. liberty, economic regulation, or social inclusion. It's primarily an administrative update.
